resources.string:
Cadpage Paging Service is now supported!!!
 See http://www.cadpage.org/paging-service
 
 New option to force use of Google Maps for map requests.
 
 New option to allow alert tone to override mute control but not volume control.
 
 New Locations:
 Barnstable County, MA
 Barry County, MO
 Montgomery County, VA
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Knox County, IN
 Shelby County, IN
 Black Hawk County, IA
 Boone County, KY
 Madison County, NY
 Wilson County, NC
 Linn County, OR
 Crawford County, PA
 Pickens County, SC
 Smyth County, VA
 Hardy County, WV
